title: #208: Forensically Deconstructing Jeffrey Epstein Part 4
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa analyse Episodes #3 ‘All Access’ and #4 ‘Buried Secrets’ of Wondery’s six part series ‘The Mysterious Mr Epstein.’ We go behind the scenes and continue to unravel and call out the co-conspirators, enablers and defenders.


#CoerciveControl

#Epstein
